'''''One''''' (stylized as '''''one''''' on Bandcamp) is the soundtrack released for ''[[Minecraft: The Story of Mojang]]'' by [[C418]], which features all of the songs in the documentary. It was released on December 23, 2012 on Bandcamp, Deezer, and YouTube Music (back then known as Google Play Music), followed by a release on January 2, 2013 on Spotify, Apple Music, and Amazon Music. A physical edition was also released by {{w|Fangamer}}, containing four remixes.<ref>[https://www.fangamer.com/products/minecraft-doc-film-soundtrack C418 - one] - Fangamer</ref>

== Official description ==
{{q|''one is the biggest album I ever created. Originally most of the songs were made for the official soundtrack to the documentary about Minecraft, but I think this album has become even bigger than that.''<br/><br/>''I hope you'll like it as much as I had fun creating it!''|[https://c418.bandcamp.com/album/one Bandcamp]}}
